pr_title: [pulsar-client] Avoid subscribing the same topic again

timeline.message: Use full topic name as key of topics
Add unit tests of resubscribing the same topic

timeline.bodyText: Why remove !topicNameValid(topicName) ? I think we should return Topic name not valid when the topic name does not valid and return Already subscribe to {} for the duplicate topic name.
timeline.author: codelipenghui

replies.bodyText: I validate it in line 746 to 748. Because TopicName could be reused, if I wrap the validation in topicNameValid, I have to create TopicName to get full topic name and partitioned topic name again. I can't think an elegant way to do it so I create a TopicName instance at first of subscribeAsync and do checks
replies.author: BewareMyPower

replies.bodyText: @codelipenghui Sorry I haven't noticed the later part of your review before. I didn't change the original behavior in this PR because it needs relative changes with unit tests. I'll do it soon.
replies.author: BewareMyPower

timeline.bodyText: It seems that we do not need to add these methods?
timeline.author: codelipenghui

replies.bodyText: getTopicName and getFullTopicName are just for ignoring the exceptions because we will throw a PulsarClientException later. removeTopic is to ensure that the key to remove is a full topic name.
replies.author: BewareMyPower

timeline.message: Return already subscribed error for duplicated topic name
Add unit tests for subscribing the same topic with prefix
Change topic name to be consistent with test name
